generic_try_later.en: Hmm... something went wrong. Please try again later.

invalid_login.en: Either that username or that password was wrong (or the account is disabled). Please try again or contact your organization's help desk.

rate_limit_seconds.en: There have been too many failed logins for this account. Please wait about {number} seconds, then try again.

rate_limit_1_minute.en: There have been too many failed logins for this account. Please wait a minute, then try again.

rate_limit_minutes.en: There have been too many failed logins for this account. Please wait about {number} minutes, then try again.
